export const initBoardState = (isWhite, boardRotation) => {
    const pieceNames = [
        "castle_w_1",
        "knight_w_1",
        "bishop_w_1",
        "queen_w",
        "king_w",
        "bishop_w_2",
        "knight_w_2",
        "castle_w_2",
        "pawn_w_1",
        "pawn_w_2",
        "pawn_w_3",
        "pawn_w_4",
        "pawn_w_5",
        "pawn_w_6",
        "pawn_w_7",
        "pawn_w_8",
        "castle_b_1",
        "knight_b_1",
        "bishop_b_1",
        "queen_b",
        "king_b",
        "bishop_b_2",
        "knight_b_2",
        "castle_b_2",
        "pawn_b_1",
        "pawn_b_2",
        "pawn_b_3",
        "pawn_b_4",
        "pawn_b_5",
        "pawn_b_6",
        "pawn_b_7",
        "pawn_b_8",
    ];
    const boardState = {};
    for (let i = 0; i < 32; i++) {
        if (i < 16)
            boardState[pieceNames[i]] = {
                row: boardRotation.white[0],
                col: i % 8,
                hasMoved: false,
                isOwner: isWhite,
                isAlive: true,
            };
        else
            boardState[pieceNames[i]] = {
                row: boardRotation.black[0],
                col: i % 8,
                hasMoved: false,
                isOwner: isWhite,
                isAlive: true,
            };
    }
    console.log(boardState);
    return boardState;
    /* return {
        castle_w_1: {
            row: boardRotation.white[0],
            col: 0,
            hasMoved: false,
            isOwner: isWhite,
            alive: true,
        },
        knight_w_1: {
            row: boardRotation.white[0],
            col: 1,
            hasMoved: false,
            isOwner: isWhite,
            isAlive: true,
        },
        bishop_w_1: {
            row: boardRotation.white[0],
            col: 2,
            hasMoved: false,
            isOwner: isWhite,
            alive: true,
        },
        queen_w: {
            row: boardRotation.white[0],
            col: 3,

            alive: true,
        },
        king_w: {
            row: boardRotation.white[0],
            col: 4,

            alive: true,
        },
        castle_w_2: {
            row: boardRotation.white[0],
            col: 7,
            hasMoved: false,
            isOwner: isWhite,
            alive: true,
        },
        knight_w_2: {

            col: 6,
            hasMoved: false,
            isOwner: isWhite,
            alive: true,
        },
        bishop_w_2: {
            row: boardRotation.white[0],
            col: 5,
            hasMoved: false,
            isOwner: isWhite,
            alive: true,
        },
        pawn_w_1: {
            row: boardRotation.white[1],
            col: 0,
            hasMoved: false,
            isOwner: isWhite,
            alive: true,
        },
        pawn_w_2: {
            row: boardRotation.white[1],
            col: 1,
            hasMoved: false,
            isOwner: isWhite,
            alive: true,
        },
        pawn_w_3: {
            row: boardRotation.white[1],
            col: 2,
            hasMoved: false,
            isOwner: isWhite,
            alive: true,
        },
        pawn_w_4: {
            row: boardRotation.white[1],
            col: 3,
            hasMoved: false,
            isOwner: isWhite,
        },
        pawn_w_5: {
            row: boardRotation.white[1],
            col: 4,
            hasMoved: false,
            isOwner: isWhite,
            alive: true,
        },
        pawn_w_6: {
            row: boardRotation.white[1],
            col: 5,
            hasMoved: false,
            isOwner: isWhite,
            alive: true,
        },
        pawn_w_7: {
            row: boardRotation.white[1],
            col: 6,
            hasMoved: false,
            isOwner: isWhite,
            alive: true,
        },
        pawn_w_8: {
            row: boardRotation.white[1],
            col: 7,
            hasMoved: false,
            isOwner: isWhite,
            alive: true,
        },

        castle_b_1: {
            row: boardRotation.black[0],
            col: 0,
            hasMoved: false,
            isOwner: !isWhite,
            alive: true,
        },
        knight_b_1: {
            row: boardRotation.black[0],
            col: 1,

            alive: true,
        },
        bishop_b_1: {

        queen_b: {

            col: 3,
            hasMoved: false,
            isOwner: !isWhite,
            alive: true,
        },
        king_b: {
            row: boardRotation.black[0],
            col: 4,
            hasMoved: false,
            isOwner: !isWhite,
            alive: true,
        },
        castle_b_2: {
            row: boardRotation.black[0],

            alive: true,
        },
        knight_b_2: {
            row: boardRotation.black[0],

            alive: true,
        },
        pawn_b_7: {
            row: boardRotation.black[1],
            col: 6,
            hasMoved: false,
            isOwner: !isWhite,
            alive: true,
        },
        pawn_b_8: {
            row: boardRotation.black[1],
            col: 7,
            hasMoved: false,
            isOwner: !isWhite,
            alive: true,
        },
    }; */
};
